channel.title: Sketchables - Free illustrations, fresh weekly
channel.description:
Hey bootstrappers!
I've started a side project which is giving away illustrations with source files. They are free to use for personal and commercial projects.
Go here - [Sketchables](https://sketchables.co)
Here are a few examples, for lovers of punny 404 pages: [You need to mooove it mooove it](https://sketchables.co/sketchable/pqL2EgEO/funny-404-page-cow-moove-it) [Oh deer!](https://sketchables.co/sketchable/j8g8mLRP/funny-404-page-oh-deer) [Are you toadally lost?](https://sketchables.co/sketchable/ZMeV2eY0/funny-404-page-toad-toadally-lost) [Baaaack off](https://sketchables.co/sketchable/QjA48Aa2/funny-404-page-sheep-baaaack-off) [Are you kitten me right meow](https://sketchables.co/sketchable/JOgqygvj/funny-404-page-kitten-right-meow)
Finally, if you are looking for a particular design for your own project - post here and I'll see if I can get one done for you. There's no charge while I'm still experimenting with the site :)
Hit me with any feedback too. I started this after not finding sketches I wanted in the generic stock photos / icons sites.

item.title: Sketchables - Free illustrations, fresh weekly
item.dc:creator: mgowski
item.description:
Good point! I’m going to see if I can make it more obvious…

Read full topic

item.title: Sketchables - Free illustrations, fresh weekly
item.dc:creator: snapey
item.description:
Then you have to ask, how come I missed it…

Read full topic

item.title: Sketchables - Free illustrations, fresh weekly
item.dc:creator: mgowski
item.description:
Yes! You can subscribe to the mailing list on each page.

Read full topic

item.title: Sketchables - Free illustrations, fresh weekly
item.dc:creator: snapey
item.description:
@mgowski
Nice!

Are you not cultivating a mailing list? If say, I like your designs but can’t see anything I like right now, you are expecting me to remember your site and check back? A list would allow you to send out a monthly mailshot with thumbnails of new images.

Read full topic
